author: cmpilato
msg: * site/publish/docs/release-notes/1.4.html,
* site/publish/docs/release-notes/1.5.html,
* site/publish/docs/release-notes/1.6.html,
* site/publish/docs/release-notes/1.7.html
Clarify that the "current 'best' release" status is "as of the time
of its release".  I was caught offguard recently when I read the 1.5
release notes and saw them claiming (without sufficient qualification)
to be the best release of Subversion.

author: gpetracek
msg: EXTCDI-151 improve javadoc

author: stsp
msg: Fix a regression introduced in r1079828. Working copies not coming from
the repository root were reported as switched.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/svnversion_tests.py
(non_reposroot_wc): Remove XFail marker.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/wc-queries.sql
(STMT_SELECT_SWITCHED_NODES): Do not check for switched status of the
working copy root, this is done in the C code. Note that this query
expects a slash for non-empty wcroot REPOS_PATHs.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/wc_db.c
(svn_wc__db_revision_status): While binding arguments to the
STMT_SELECT_SWITCHED_NODES query, append a slash to non-empty REPOS_PATHs
of the working copy root. Allows the query to match the path correctly
when concatenated with a LOCAL_RELPATH.

author: coheigea
msg: Added example of a custom SAML Token validator.

author: bdelacretaz
msg: SLING-1981 - do not fail if TestObjectProcessor is missing, happens when running tests with SlingRemoteExecutionRule
